manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1: After applying face cream, get your mask ready to work it's magic! Step 2: Apply evenly across face. Step 3: After product is absorbed completely, leave treatment overnight. Step 4: Rinse off in the morning and use once or twice a week

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The LANEIGE Water Sleeping Mask is a popular and well-loved Korean skincare product known for its hydrating and skin-refreshing properties. It's designed to be used as an overnight mask to provide intense hydration and improve the overall condition of your skin while you sleep. Here's a review of the LANEIGE Water Sleeping Mask:1. Intense Hydration: One of the standout features of this mask is its ability to deliver deep hydration. The gel-like texture is packed with moisture, and it effectively replenishes your skin's moisture levels, leaving my skin plump and dewy by the morning.2. Lightweight and Non-Greasy: I appreciate that the Water Sleeping Mask has a lightweight, non-greasy formula. It doesn't feel heavy on the skin and absorbs relatively quickly, making it comfortable to wear while you sleep.3. Cooling Sensation: I absolutely enjoy the cooling sensation upon application, which can be especially refreshing during hot weather or if you have irritated skin.4. Brightening Effect: With regular use, I have noticed that their skin appears brighter and more radiant. The mask contains various skin-brightening ingredients, such as Hunza apricot extract and evening primrose root extract.5. Versatility: While it's marketed as an overnight mask, some people use it as a quick pick-me-up during the day or as a regular moisturizer for extra hydration.6. Pleasant Fragrance: I also enjoy the subtle, pleasant fragrance of the product, though it's worth noting that fragrance can be a potential irritant for some individuals with sensitive skin.7. Packaging: The product comes in a sleek, blue jar with a spatula for hygienic application.8. Suitable for Most Skin Types: The LANEIGE Water Sleeping Mask is generally suitable for most skin types, including dry, normal, combination, and even oily skin. However, as with any skincare product, it's advisable to perform a patch test if you have sensitive or reactive skin.Overall, the LANEIGE Water Sleeping Mask is known to provide deep hydration, improve skin texture, and give users a refreshed and radiant complexion. It's a versatile product that can be a great addition to your skincare routine, particularly if you're looking to boost your skin's moisture levels and wake up with a revitalized look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love how it smells, and feels on my face. My face has been clear and shiny and glossy. Best moisturizer I have used in a very long time!! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noticeable effects the morning after
reviews.reviewText: The smell of this product is light, pleasant. A little goes a long way — I’m a guy and a dime sized amount is enough for my face and neck. Goes on slick and light. I use this at night, and my skin is noticeably smoother and softer in the morning. I’ve seen no other effects on tone or brightness, but the moisturizing properties are great.My only note is, it does ‘sit’ on the skin after application, leaving an odd feel to your face, slightly rubbery almost. But since I use it at night I don’t mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to try a hydrating sleep mask for months. I decided on this after reading many reviews. My face was really dry and irritated from dermaplaning and a typical dry winter weather. This product absorbed quickly. It did somewhat soothe my irritated skin when applied soon after treatment. But didn’t deliver the deep hydration I was needing. No glow here.It’s possible my skin is just too dry after applying retin-A regularly for acne and dermaplaning. ( I didn’t apply retin-A before applying this). I thought my skin would have felt softer and have a hydrated glow after a few nights. No noticeable feel or look of my skin.Decent product, no smell, no irritation. I gave it 4 stars as it may work perfect for someone without a severely dry skin type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates your face!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this product. I have really sensitive skin that can get very dry in the winter. And this sleep mask hydrates my face & when I wash it off in the morning my face feels smooth and very moisturized. It is light on my sensitive skin as well! Definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love this cream!!!
reviews.reviewText: Foe the cost, texture and how to apply before you go to bed. I apply right after I apply my tretinoin cream to my face, for a moisturizer and to lock it in. So far wonderful product not greasy. Would definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It feels like heaven on ur face
reviews.reviewText: It smells good and the product is big which means u can use it for a long time so worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My favorite mask to wear. Super light weight and keeps your face moistured

I love this night cream. I often have chapped skin on my cheeks the whole year round thus the initial reason for purchasing. It is a wonderful cream and my face, especially my cheeks by my ears, say thank you. I would recommend this cream to anyone. It feels so heavenly as it is going on, heavenly and luxurious.Thanks. Sue
Me encantó deja la piel súper idratada al otro día además con un poquito que pongas se siente muy suave la cara y además como que te relaja
Esta mascarilla ha dejado mi piel muy suave. La recomiendo.
Makes your face feel smooth and soft. Easy to apply smell good

This is considered one of the best overnight sleeping water masks in the market for a reason. Seems a bit expensive at first but you get a fair amount and after a couple weeks of use you'll see a huge difference in your skin. It's also veerrry important to keep your skin moisturized overnight while you're sleeping and this does an amazing job doing that. 100% recommend this!
